vertical.description: Put Stepper in vertical mode (instead of horizontal by default)
vertical.description_zh: 将步进器置于垂直模式（而不是默认的水平模式）

alternative-labels.description: Use alternative labels - stacks the icon on top of the label (applies only to horizontal stepper)
alternative-labels.description_zh: 使用替代标签 - 将图标堆叠在标签顶部（仅适用于水平步进器）

contracted.description: Hide header labels on narrow windows
contracted.description_zh: 在狭窄的窗口上隐藏标题标签

inactive-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
inactive-color.desc: Color name from the Quasar Palette for half selected icons
inactive-color.description_zh: 类星体调色板中组件的颜色名称

done-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; If 'none' (String) is used as value, then it will defer to prefix or the regular icon for this state; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

done-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
done-color.desc: Color name from the Quasar Palette for half selected icons
done-color.description_zh: 类星体调色板中组件的颜色名称

active-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; If 'none' (String) is used as value, then it will defer to prefix or the regular icon for this state; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

active-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
active-color.desc: Color name from the Quasar Palette for half selected icons
active-color.description_zh: 类星体调色板中组件的颜色名称

error-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; If 'none' (String) is used as value, then it will defer to prefix or the regular icon for this state; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

error-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
error-color.desc: Color name from the Quasar Palette for half selected icons
error-color.description_zh: 类星体调色板中组件的颜色名称

header-class.description: Class definitions to be attributed to the header
header-class.description_zh: 要归因于标头的类定义
